author: mariadalfonso
body:
Redefined some of the noise terms in the M2chi2.
Mainly to take values from the DB and not from the hard coded python.
Only minor changes are expected in the Phase1-siPM
Validation slides are here
http://dalfonso.web.cern.ch/dalfonso/NoiseDefCleanup.pdf
title: HBHE M2: noise definition cleanup
